RecTLDProductionStatus.tableName: temp_Reza Food Services Co_ Ltd$TLD Production Status

RecNode.tableName: temp_Reza Food Services Co_ Ltd$Node Status

SalesCustomInfoDetail.tableName: temp_Reza Food Services Co_ Ltd$Sales Custom Info Detail

CustomInfo.tableName: temp_Reza Food Services Co_ Ltd$Cashless POS

SalesCustomInfoRefund.tableName: temp_Reza Food Services Co_ Ltd$Sales Custom Info Detail(Refund)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{string(pipeline().parameters.file_name)}' as Process,
'@{pipeline().parameters.stld_filename}'as File_Name,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{activity('ExecuteSalesDataflow_copy1').output.reportLineageToPurview.status} ' as status

activities.name: ExecuteSalesDataflow_copy1
activities.description:
At this point we are triggering RFS_SALES_DATAFLOW to run for process each xml file parallelly.
So XML to all sql staging tables mapping process done here.

RecTLDProductionStatus.tableName: temp_Reza Food Services Co_ Ltd$TLD Production Status

RecNode.tableName: temp_Reza Food Services Co_ Ltd$Node Status

SalesCustomInfoRefund.tableName: temp_Reza Food Services Co_ Ltd$Sales Custom Info Detail(Refund)

activities.name: MoveFiletoSuccess
activities.description:
At this stage we are capturing succussed files. 
Those files moving to stldarch container using this activity.

activities.name: Copy_SP_Variables_Data
activities.description:
Using this activity, we are capturing processed filename through variable with it's storeid and businessdate and mapping it to [temp_RFS_Run_Filesdata] named sql staging table.
Using this process we monitoring which file processed and for which business date and storeid.

activities.name: MoveFiletoErrorOnSPFailure
activities.description:
At this stage we are capturing error file who fails to execute previous activity.
Those files moving to stlderr container using this activity.

activities.name: sales logs
activities.description:
This activity maintains logs.
All details maintained in sales pipeline logs table.
Colum's mapping is present in mapping section

'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{pipeline().parameters.A}' as status

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{string(pipeline().parameters.file_name)}' as Process,
'@{pipeline().parameters.stld_filename}'as File_Name,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{pipeline().parameters.B}' as status

activities.name: Get List of Files
activities.description:
Using This activity, you will get total count of zip files are present at source location.
Total count will be output result of this activity & input for foreach activity.

activities.name: ProcessEachFile
activities.description:
This activity has multiple inner activity inside.
Number of Runs of this activity equal to total count of input files.
It will process each file parallelly.

activities.name: SetFileName
activities.description: This activity will set file name variable value as a processed item name.

activities.name: CopyPOSSTLDtoStaging
activities.description:
This activity performs copy task.
It copies all files to stldtemp2 location which includes STLD in their name.

activities.name: ExtractZipFiles
activities.description:
Extract zip file into stldtemp container.
So each zip file from stldetl container will extract to stldtemp container.

activities.name: ExecuteSalesXML
activities.description: This is inner activity inside foreach activity. which Executes RFS_SALES_PROCESS named child pipeline for each file.

activities.name: GetSTLDXMLName
activities.description: This activity use to get processed stld file and pass same file to child pipeline for next process.

activities.name: DeleteandMoveTemp
activities.description: Using this activity deleting all files from stldtemp and stldtemp2 containers.

activities.name: CheckServerStatus
activities.description: This activity check server status to proceed ahead. If server status is online activity will succeed, if server is offline activity will Faile & throw an error message.

activities.name: Truncate_Sales_Temp_Tables
activities.description:
This activity runs [SP_TRUNCATE_ALL_SALES_TEMP_TABLES] Stored procedure.
This stored procedure going to truncates all sales staging table.

activities.name: ExecuteNamesDB
activities.description:
Executes RFS_NAMESDB pipeline.
Which process if namedb file exist in namedb container.

activities.name: ExecuteProductDB
activities.description:
Executes RFS_PRODUCTDB pipeline.
Which process if productdb file exist in productdb container.

activities.name: Executesalessp
activities.description:
Executes [SP_Sales_Main] stored procedure.
This stored procedure includes 
SP_TRX_ItemQTY_Update
SP_Update_TotalTax_Manualy
stored procedure to update quantity and tax of sales main tables.

activities.name: GETLISTOFXMLFILES
activities.description:
Using This activity, you will get total count of xml files are present at source location.
Total count will be output result of this activity & input for foreach activity.

activities.name: PROCESSALLXMLFILES
activities.description:
This activity has inner activity inside.
Number of Runs of this activity equal to total count of input files.
It will process each file parallelly.

activities.name: ExecuteXMLFile
activities.description: This is inner activity inside foreach activity. which Executes RFS_SALES_PROCESS named child pipeline for each file.

activities.name: Truncate_Sales_Temp_Tables
activities.description:
This activity runs [SP_TRUNCATE_ALL_SALES_TEMP_TABLES] Stored procedure.
This stored procedure going to truncates all sales staging table.

activities.name: Executesalessp
activities.description:

This stored procedure includes 
SP_TRX_ItemQTY_Update
SP_Update_TotalTax_Manualy
stored procedure to update quantity and tax of sales main tables.
